mapper.insert: insert into agency (agency_id, agency_password, agency_name, agency_tel, agency_address, agency_latitude, agency_longitude) values(#{agency_id}, #{agency_password}, #{agency_name}, #{agency_tel}, #{agency_address}, #{agency_latitude}, #{agency_longitude})
mapper.select: select agency_id, agency_name, agency_password from agency where agency_id=#{agency_id}
